parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the ECS instance. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: LogicalRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the custom namespace.

*   The ID of a custom namespace is in the `region ID:custom namespace ID` format. Example: cn-beijing:tdy218.
*   The ID of the default namespace is in the `region ID` format. Example: cn-beijing.
